thread.section_title: www.iElectrica.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.iElectrica.com | www.ielectrica.com
thread.title: Paul M

author: Paul M
title: Paul M
text: I was reluctant to make a big ticket purchase item from an online dealer but surprisingly the experience was very positive. I was able to track my order and it took just over 9 days from order to delivery. The TV was in great shape and the price was fantastic. I was concerned about shipping a OLED TV, since I never actually ordered one I didn't throw in my car and take home. The delivery guys were quick but did open it to make sure it worked. I would recommend iElectric for sure and will look to them for future purchases.
